kw.name: Dado um usuário realizando login no sistema
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return Status
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Fail
kw.arg: 1º Passo: Falhou - Página de Login não encontrada
kw.doc: Fails the test with the given message and optionally alters its tags.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.
kw.msg: &{fields} = { Campo de Email=//input[@type="text"] | Campo de Senha=//input[@type="password"] | Botão de Entrar=//button[@id="btn-login"] }

kw.name: Create List
kw.doc: Returns a list containing given items.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return Status
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Append To List
kw.doc: Adds ``values`` to the end of ``list``.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.
